recipe.title: RIBBON PASTA WITH MUSHROOMS AND TRUFFLE OIL
recipe.description: Cut the bacon and mushrooms into thin strips and fry until crisp on an even heat. Add the cream and garlic appetizer. Boil until the sauce starts to thicken. Add salt to taste. Add the pasta to boiling, salted water and cook until al dente. Leave the pasta to drain in a colander. Then pour into the warm sauce in the pan. Mix well and sprinkle with finely grated parmesan. Finally, season the dish with freshly ground pepper and truffle oil and garnish with parsley.

ingredients.item: 1 bag of Nicolas Vahé Pasta / mushroom
2 tsp Nicolas Vahé Appetizer / pure garlic
Nicolas Vahé Salt og Pepper / Everyday Mix

recipe.title: RISOTTO CROQUANT
recipe.description: Prepare the risotto by following the instructions on the bag. Leave to cool. Fry the onion and ham on a hot pan with some olive oil until golden. Add the diced mozzarella, fried onion and ham to the cold risotto and season with salt and pepper. Then roll the risotto into small, round balls and bread them by coating them in whipped whole eggs, flour and breadcrumbs. Deep-fry the balls in oil at 180 C until golden. This takes approx. 3-4 minutes. Serve on frisée lettuce seasoned with walnut oil and truffle glaze.

ingredients.item: Nicolas Vahé Extra virgin olive oil

recipe.title: APRICOT AND DATE CHUTNEY WITH PISTACHIO OIL
recipe.description: Cut the apricots, dates, onion and garlic into small pieces. Pour sugar and honey into a pan and caramelise until golden. Carefully add balsamic vinegar and lemon juice and boil for 2-3 minutes with the vanilla bean, pepper and cinnamon stick. Add the apricots, dates, onion and garlic and simmer for approx. 30 minutes at low heat. Leave to cool and finally add pistachio oil. Store cool in a tightly closed container and serve within 8 days. Enjoy the chutney with e.g. cheese or paté.

ingredients.item: 1 dl Nicolas Vahé White wine vinegar / Aceto Balsamico

recipe.title: OVEN-BAKED ARTICHOKES
recipe.description: crub the artichokes and place them in an ovenproof dish. Add hazelnut oil and salt. Bake them in the oven at 180 C for 20-25 minutes, depending on the size of the artichokes. When ready, coat them in as much pesto as you want. Finish with grated parmesan.

ingredients.item: Nicolas Vahé Salt / parmesan og basil
Nicolas Vahé Pesto / green olives og fennel or tomato og artichoke

item.productdescription: Pesto med Grønne Oliven og Fennikel
Salt med Parmesan Ost og Basilikum

recipe.title: APPLE CRUMBLE WITH CRéME FRAICHE AND WHITE PUNCH
recipe.description: Peel and dice the apples. Coat in pistachio curd and place in a tart mould with a diameter of approx. 25 cm. Grate the marzipan with a grater and sprinkle over the apples. Mix the oats, butter, sugar and vanilla from 1 vanilla pod in a food processor until the mixture has a crumb-like consistency. Top the apples with the mixture and bake the cake for approx. 30 minutes at 200 C. Serve the dish warm with crème fraiche mixed with Nicolas Vahé white punch extract.

recipe.title: PESTO BREAD
recipe.description: Stir the tepid water, sugar, yeast, salt and pesto together in a bowl. Add the flour and knead the dough well for approx. 14 minutes in a mixer. Allow the dough to rest in the bowl for 40 minutes at room temperature. Knead the dough by hand into a ball, and set aside in a dough rising basket sprinkled with plenty of flour. Allow to rise for 1 hour. Pre-heat the oven to 250 C. Place an ovenproof dish in the bottom of the oven. Carefully turn the dough onto a warm baking plate covered with greaseproof paper. Put the bread in the oven, and pour approx. 1 dl of water into the ovenproof dish. Quickly close the oven to avoid the steam escaping. Bake at 250 C for 5 minutes. Then turn the oven down to 200 C. Bake the bread for approx. 30 minutes until a crisp crust appears.

ingredients.item: 25 g Nicolas Vahé French Sea Salt

item.productdescription: Pesto med Grønne Oliven og Fennikel

recipe.title: OLIVE AND FETA CHEESE CAKE
recipe.description: Pre-heat the oven to 180 C. Mix flour and baking powder in a bowl. Make a hollow in the middle and add the eggs and oil. Pour the cream into the flour mixture. Whisk everything thoroughly together. Dice the feta cheese and add cheese, pesto and a little salt and pepper to the mixture. Mix well. Grease a bread tin with butter and pour in the dough. Serve the cake hot or cold. Bake the cake in the oven for approx. 40 minutes. Leave to cool. It tastes fantastic with different types of pesto. Serve with aperitifs or add a special twist to your dinner.

ingredients.item: 1 dl Nicolas Vahé Olive oil / garlic
2 tbsp Nicolas Vahé Pesto / olive og almond
Nicolas Vahé Pepper / The Mixed Blend

recipe.title: FARCIES - SOUTHERN FRENCH VEGETABLE DISH
recipe.description: Cut the top off the tomatoes and scoop out the flesh. Set aside the flesh in a bowl. Sprinkle salt inside the tomatoes and place them on a paper towel to drip. Cut the peppers in halves and remove stalks and seeds. Mix the pork and veal with the onions, eggs, fresh herbs, garlic appetizer, salt and pepper. Add the flesh of the tomatoes and leave to rest in the refrigerator. Stuff the vegetables with the mince, and bake them in the oven at 180 C for approx. 30 minutes. Keep an eye on the vegetables as the exact cooking time depends on the size of the vegetables. Serve with warm bread, a green salad, and marinated meat on skewers.

ingredients.item: 2 tsp Nicolas Vahé Appetizer / pure garlic
Nicolas Vahé Pepper / The Mixed Blend
Nicolas Vahé Salt / parmesan og basil
Nicolas Vahé Extra virgin olive oil

item.productdescription: Salt med Parmesan Ost og Basilikum

recipe.title: TOMATO SNACKS
recipe.description: Cut out 10 circles from the puff pastry, using a glass or a round pastry cutter. Place them on a sheet of baking paper and spread with pesto. Place a cherry tomato on top and sprinkle with salt, pepper and olive oil. Bake at 220 C for about 10 minutes. Sprinkle with finely chopped thyme and rosemary and serve while warm.

ingredients.item: 1 glass Nicolas Vahé Pesto / pure tomato

recipe.title: BRUSCHETTA
recipe.description: Dissolve yeast and salt in the lukewarm water. Slowly work the flour into the liquid; use the dough hook on your hand mixer or knead the dough by hand for about 5 min. Then leave the dough covered in a warm place for 11/2 hours. Sprinkle flour on your worktop and roll out the dough into a square that measures 30x40 cm and which is about 2 cm thick. Spread pesto and sprinkle the Herbes de Provence over the dough. Drizzle the dough with Nicolas Vahé Olive oil with garlic. Close the bread from the left and cover the right-hand side. Brush the edges with water, and press the bread together at the sides using a fork. Finally, brush the bread with Nicolas Vahé Olive oil and sprinkle with Herbes de Provence. Make cuts at a slant every 2 cm, so that the filling inside is visible. Bake the bread for about 30 min. at 180 C, or until the bread has a crisp crust.

ingredients.item: 150 g Nicolas Vahé Pesto / black olive og basil

item.productdescription: Pesto med Sorte Oliven og Basilikum

recipe.title: KETCHUP A LA NICOLAS (250 ml)
recipe.description: Cut tomatoes, onion and garlic into smaller pieces. Let them simmer in a saucepan at low heat for 30 min. Blend the mixture until it is smooth, and add the two types of vinegar. Put the saucepan back on the heat and allow the mixture to simmer until it has reduced to half the amount (about 45 min. at low heat). Stir the mixture until it is even, and then strain it. Add salt, pepper, sugar and lemon juice. Reduce the mixture for the last time to half the amount over a low heat, until it gains a nice, smooth consistency. Pour the homemade ketchup into a bottle or a jar that can be closed tightly, and leave it in the refrigerator. The ketchup will be ready for use after 2-3 days and will keep for about two weeks in the refrigerator.

ingredients.item: 5 dl Nicolas Vahé Red wine vinegar / raspberry
2.5 dl Nicolas Vahé Red wine vinegar / Aceto balsamico di Modena

recipe.title: BAKED GOATS CHEESE IN BACON
recipe.description: Cut the cheese into pieces of around 50 g each and roll a piece of bacon around each piece of cheese. Finely dice the apple. Make a dressing of balsamico, mustard, olive oil and orange juice and add the diced apple. Place the salad leaves in the dressing and toss.Fry the cheese in a hot pan until the bacon is crisp. Serve with salad.

ingredients.item: 5 tsp Nicolas Vahé Red wine vinegar / Aceto balsamico de Modena
2 tsp Nicolas Vahé Mustard / raspberry og ginger, 190 g
6 tbsp Nicolas Vahé Olive oil / basil

recipe.title: BAKED POTATOES WITH PESTO AND HERBE
recipe.description: Finely chop garlic and herbs. Place all the ingredients for the marinade in a bowl and mix using your hands. Take a small piece of baking paper, place two potatoes in the middle and pour a tablespoon of the marinade over. Then gather the paper together to form a bag and tie with a small piece of meat string. Create three more packages. Garnish with sprigs of rosemary or thyme. Bake in the oven for 8 min. at 180 C or 8 min. under the grill.

ingredients.item: 100 g Nicolas Vahé Pesto / black olives og basil
3 spsk Nicolas Vahé Olive oil / lemon

item.productdescription: Pesto med Sorte Oliven og Basilikum

recipe.title: BRUSCETTA A LA NICOLAS
recipe.description: CRUMBLE THE FETA CHEESE USING A FORK. ADD THE QUARK AND SEASON WITH SALT AND PEPPER. DRIZZLE THE SLICES OF BREAD WITH NICOLAS VAHé OLIVE OIL AND SPRINKLE WITH FINELY-CHOPPED GARLIC. TOAST THE BREAD IN THE MIDDLE OF THE OVEN FOR 5 MIN. AT 220 C UNTIL GOLDEN AND CRISP ON TOP. SPREAD A LAYER OF PESTO ON THE BREAD AND TOP OFF WITH THE FETA MIXTURE. ADD THE CHERRY TOMATOES AND SLICED LEEKS AND BAKE AT 220 C FOR 8 MIN. SERVE RIGHT AWAY.

ingredients.item: 3 tbsp Niclas Vahé Extra virgin olive oil
100 g Nicolas Vahé Pesto / black olives og basil
250 g cherry tomatoes cut in half

item.productdescription: Pesto med Sorte Oliven og Basilikum

recipe.title: RISOTTO WITH MUSHROOMS
recipe.description: Bring the water to the boil and add the contents of the bag. Leave to simmer at medium heat with no lid for around 15 minutes until the water has been absorbed. Add olive oil, cream and grated parmesan while stirring. Season with salt and pepper.

recipe.title: FRESH PASTA WITH RED PEPPER PESTO
recipe.description: Cook the fresh pasta in a large pan of boiling water until it is al dente. Drain the pasta and place it in a large bowl. Stir in the pesto and season with salt and pepper. Garnish with fresh basil leaves and add parmesan cheese to taste. Serve the pasta with freshly baked bread and/or grilled chicken or fish.

ingredients.item: 3 tbsp Nicolas Vahé Pesto / pure red pepper

recipe.title: MELON SALAD WITH SESAME SEEDS AND CORIANDER
recipe.description: Dice the melons, chop the coriander and mix it in a bowl. Add the cane sugar, red wine vinegar, sesame seeds and pepper and toss with your hands. Place in the fridge for 15 min. before serving. Garnish with raspberries.

ingredients.item: 1 tbsp Nicolas Vahé Red wine vinegar / raspberry

recipe.title: FOUGASSE BREAD
recipe.description: Mix the yeast and salt into the lukewarm water and slowly add the flour. Either use a mixer or knead the dough by hand for around 5 minutes. Allow the dough to rest in a warm location for around 11/2 hours. Dust some flour over your work surface and roll the dough out to a size of 30x40 cm - leaving it a few centimetres thick. Cover the dough with the pesto and herbes de Provence. Drizzle with the olive oil and seal the loaf by lifting the left side over to cover the right side. Brush the edges with a little water and crim Cut 2 cm wide grooves at an angle so that you can see the olive filling. Bake for 30 minutes at 180 C until the loaf is crisp on top. You can also use artichokes, sun-dried tomatoes or another pesto from Nicolas Vahé.

ingredients.item: 150 g Nicolas Vahé Pesto / black olives og basil
6 tbsp Nicolas Vahé Extra virgin olive oil

item.productdescription: Pesto med Sorte Oliven og Basilikum

recipe.title: Winter salad
recipe.description: Cut off the branches of the beetroots. Keep the leaves and put them in iced water to get them nice and crisp so they may later be used as the salad. Cook the beetroots in the oven at 160 C for 90 minutes. Pinch them with a fork to check if they are cooked. When ready the beetroot should fall off the fork. Peel the beetroots; cut them into 2 by 2 cm cubes and place in a bowl. When they are still warm add 2 tablespoons of raspberry vinaigrette and the pistachio oil. Let the beetroots cool down to room temperature before finishing the salad. Mix the beetroot leaves with the beetroots and arrange on two plates. Sprinkle with hazelnuts, pomegranate seeds, raspberries and grapes. Break the feta cheese over the salad with your hands. Use the last tablespoon of raspberry vinaigrette to sprinkle around the salad.

ingredients.item: 5 fresh beetroots with branches and leaves A
A handful of green grapes cut in halves
